title: Dr Shirani Bandaranayake new Chief Justice
content: Senior Supreme Court Judge and one time Dean of the Faculty of Law, Colombo University, Dr Shirani Bandaranayake was sworn in before President Mahinda Rajapaksa yesterday as the country’s first female Chief Justice. The swearing in took place at Temple Trees yesterday. Dr Bandaranayake was the youngest woman judge to be appointed to the Supreme…
